/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with tall buildings, their facades adorned with vibrant graffiti, adding a touch of urban artistry to the cityscape. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a hazy sky, a common sight in many urban areas. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, reflecting the blend of nature and man-made structures in the city.
